thread.title: Question Time: Live coverage of the BBC show from Exeter - Devon Live

author: Rom Preston-Ellis
title: Question Time: Live coverage of the BBC show from Exeter - Devon Live
text:
Next up is defence spending
The phrases ‘Gavin Williamson’ and ‘wet flannel’ have been mentioned at least once... 23:36 Here's what he said in full... 23:33 This guy isn't holding back This man had some strong views on Question Time
“We voted to leave and we will leave,” this man in the checkered shirt wasn’t shy about expressing his thoughts 23:30 'We will get a good deal because of places like Marsh Barton trading estate'
That’s the message from one audience member.
She says she drives into Exeter through the trading estate every morning and knows European companies will want to make a Brexit deal with the UK. 23:24 Are Exeter's left-leaning inclinations shining through? 23:21 Rom Preston-Ellis Andddd they're talking about Brexit...
It’s taken more than half an hour but things have inevitably descended into an argument about Brexit.
Exeter was one of only two areas in Devon to vote to remain in the EU back in June 2016. 23:19 Have you seen anyone you know? 23:17 Anyone reckon Lewis is being slightly sarcastic? 23:13 This is what Janet Street Porter had to say about the expansion of Heathrow Airport 23:09 Praise for the people of Exeter 23:09 Maybe they should be building it at Exeter Airport... 23:06 People have noticed there aren't too many Devon accents in the audience... 23:02 Rom Preston-Ellis Danny Dyer to be the next host of Question Time?!
There are calls for Danny Dyer to be the next host of Question Time following some ‘interesting’ comments on Good Evening Britain tonight.
With David Dimbleby stepping down in the autumn it would certainly be a change of direction for the show...
WARNING STRONG LANGUAGE 22:57 Rom Preston-Ellis
“Human Rights don’t stop when your party is in power,” says Labour MP Clive Lewis when asked if he is calling for a full investigation into the actions of his party when it was in Government. 22:54 Wondering what 'enhanced interrogation' is? 22:53 Some of the early reaction is in 22:50
